mapper.select: select lec_cd, nvl((select col_name from college where col_cd = (select college_cd from major where major_cd=lm.major_cd)),' ') as col_name, nvl((select major_name from major where major_cd=lm.major_cd),' ') as major_name, nvl((select comm_cd_name from comm_cd where comm_cd_gr='geCd' and comm_cd_val=lm.ge_cd),' ') as ge_cd, (select comm_cd_name from comm_cd where comm_cd_gr='targetGrade' and comm_cd_val = target_grade) as target_grade, max_stu_num, stu_num, lec_date_1, nvl(lec_date_2,' ') as lec_date_2, classroom, credit, subj_name, (select name from prof where prof_cd=s.prof_id) as prof_name, seme_cd from syllabus S, lec_open L,lec_manage lm where syl_cd = lec_cd and s.syl_cd != 'SYL0000' and seme_cd='202202' and lm.subj_cd=s.subj_cd order by s.subj_cd
select sum(credit) from lec a,syllabus b,lec_manage c where a.lec_cd=b.syl_cd and b.subj_cd=c.subj_cd and stu_cd =#{stuCd} and seme_cd='202202'
